biotools.summary: circad is a comprehensive manually curated resource of circular RNA associated with diseases. Circular RNAs (circRNAs) are unique transcript isoforms characterised by back splicing of exon ends to form a covalently closed loop or circular conformation.

bioschemas.name: circad
bioschemas.summary: circad is a comprehensive manually curated resource of circular RNA associated with diseases. Circular RNAs (circRNAs) are unique transcript isoforms characterised by back splicing of exon ends to form a covalently closed loop or circular conformation.
